Uses of Class
itl.enabler.api.EnablerException

  • Packages that use EnablerException 
    Package Description
    itl.enabler.api
    The core forecourt classes needed by your application to connect to the Enabler

    • Uses of EnablerException in itl.enabler.api

      Methods in itl.enabler.api that throw EnablerException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Pump.abortDelivery()
      Allows transactions to be aborted for some pump types
      void Pump.authoriseNoLimits(java.lang.String clientActivity, java.lang.String clientRef, int attendantId)
      Authorise the pump with no limits
      void Pump.authoriseWithLimits(java.lang.String clientActivity, java.lang.String clientRef, int attendantId, PumpAuthoriseLimits limits)
      Authorise a pump with limitations.
      void Attendant.block(long reasonCode)
      Blocks the attendant from further transactions until unblocked
      void Forecourt.broadcastMessage(int terminalId, int notificationId, java.lang.String notificationString, int wait)
      This method allows client applications to alert other connected clients of custom events by passing an id and a string to all connected clients.
      void Pump.cancelAuthorise()
      Cancel the authorisation from a pump, this can only be done before a delivery starts
      void Pump.cancelReserve()
      Cancel a previous reserve against pump
      void Transaction.clear(TransactionClearTypes type)
      Clear the transaction
      void Attendant.CloseCurrentPeriod()
      Close the current period
      void Forecourt.connect(java.lang.String serverAddress, int terminalId, java.lang.String terminalName, java.lang.String password, java.lang.Boolean active)
      The method will create a apiConnection with the server and so it must be the first method called by an application to use the API.
      boolean Tank.getAlarm(int alarmNumber)
      Returns the status of the requested tank gauge alarm
      EnablerInterface[] HardwareInf.GetConfiguredInterfaces(EnablerInterface.EnablerInterfaceType Type)
      Returns an array of EnablerInterface objects for all configured interfaces for a particular type.
      EnablerInterface HardwareInf.GetInterface(EnablerInterface.EnablerInterfaceType Type, int ID)
      Get the status of Enabler interface card.
      void Transaction.getLock()
      Get a lock on the transaction
      Transaction Forecourt.getTransactionById(int id)
      Returns a fuel transaction using its Transaction ID
      Transaction Forecourt.getTransactionByReference(java.lang.String clientReference)
      Returns a fuel transaction using the Transaction Client reference
      void Pump.logManualTransaction(int hoseNum, double value, double volume, double volume2, double unitPrice, int priceLevel, double valueTotal, double volumeTotal, double volumeTotal2)
      Log a manual delivery against a manual pump
      void Attendant.logOffPump(int pumpNumber)
      Logs off an attendant from a pump
      void Attendant.logOnPump(int pumpNumber)
      Logs on an attendant to a pump
      void Forecourt.notifyChange(ActionType actionType, DataType dataType, int dataId)
      This method is called to notify the pump server that the configuration has changed and needs to be reloaded or an external status has changed.
      void Pump.pauseDelivery()
      Pause a delivering pump
      void Attendant.Reconcile()
      Records the current AttendantPeriodState status as Reconciled
      void Transaction.reinstate()
      Reinstate current transaction to original pump transaction stack
      void Transaction.reinstateAndLock()
      Reinstate current transaction to original pump transaction stack and get lock for current terminal ID.
      void Transaction.releaseLock()
      Release lock on transaction
      void Forecourt.removeLocksAndReserve()
      Remove all Reserves and Locks that this terminal has applied.

      void Pump.resumeDelivery()

      void Terminal.SendMessage(int code, java.lang.String message)

      Set the new prices based using passed GradePriceCollection for a defined price level
      void Tank.setBlock(boolean block)
      Block or unblock the tank so deliveries can be made from tank.
      void Pump.setBlock(boolean blockState, java.lang.String reasonMessage)
      Block/Unblock all operations on the pump.
      Blocking a Pump will prevent it from starting a new Transaction.

      Blocks or Unblocks the grade.

      Stack current transaction so that the pump can be reserved or authorised again.
      void Pump.stop()
      Permanently stop an in progress delivery.
      void Forecourt.stop()
      This methods allows clients to stop all installed pumps.
      void Attendant.unblock()
      Unblocks an attendant who has been manually blocked
